reasons: Very new wallet (10 days) with extremely high transaction velocity (234 tx/30d) is highly suspicious
Extremely low counterparty diversity (0.12) indicates possible wash trading or self-dealing
Holdings dominated by tokens with suspicious names and unverified policies
No staking activity despite high transaction volume suggests short-term exploitation intent
Activity pattern consistent with known scam wallet behaviors
Rapid accumulation of numerous low-value tokens typical of airdrop farming or spam

perspectives.security: HIGH RISK. Multiple red flags. New wallet with suspicious activity patterns. Recommend avoiding interaction.
perspectives.defi: CRITICAL RISK. Token holdings include potential scam tokens. No legitimate DeFi participation detected.
perspectives.behavioral: HIGHLY SUSPICIOUS. Extreme velocity with minimal diversity. Pattern matches known malicious actors.
perspectives.compliance: SEVERE CONCERN. Activity consistent with money laundering, wash trading, or scam operations. Report recommended.
